channel.title: SRPK 317 Resurrecting Old PK
channel.description:
SRPK 317 - Resurrecting Old PK
SRPK uses a very well know base and is a Resurrection of NRPK. It is new but is growing very fast. We dont make our updates based on what staff wants. We listen to our players to make for an RSPS that all of our player will enjoy!
Features
- Working special attacks - Fight caves - God Wars - Strong and stable economy - Top pker announcements - Generous starter pack - Kill streaks and rewards - No down time - No lag - Perfected Duel arena - Active, friendly staff team - Development team that listens to its community - Custom items - Frequent updates - Curse Prayers - Both donor and donor+ exclusive islands - Nex armors, Korasi and new firecape - Wilderness targets with rewards - Ganodermic armor - Pvp armor - Active clans in both singles and mutli - Working spirit shields
PLAY NOW: [url=http://www.srpk317.com/]http://www.srpk317.com/[/url]
Pictures:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tvButeX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Cch0mib.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pkUkjIk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pd0GcoA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3llPKRj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VTEAtyD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IOPyv8i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3m2159u.png[/img]
PLAY NOW: [url=http://www.srpk317.com/]http://www.srpk317.com/[/url]
